name: Impossible Rolling Ball: Endless Roll the Sky
name_original: Impossible Rolling Ball: Endless Roll the Sky
description:
Are you a super fan of slide puzzle or unblock puzzle game ?
If you are, this game is what is looking for.
Impossible Rolling Ball: Endless Roll the Sky is a simple and addictive puzzle game. Use your brain and try hard to solve each puzzle.
You have to slide the block to unblock and roll the ball to goal. Have fun !
